name: Overview
data:
[{"id":"39f947dd-2ae6-40b1-ba4f-de676becab0d","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Function: analyze_submodule","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"38af3b4c-3c63-410c-9fc5-a06eb4160568","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Description
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"analyze_submodule","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" function is a targeted coordination utility designed to analyze a specific imported module (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"imp","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"). Similar to the batch processing of ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"analyze_submodules","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", this method focuses on a single dependency, delegating the heavy lifting to the base class while injecting the current processor's configuration, managers, and traversal state. This ensures that the newly discovered module is analyzed as an integrated part of the existing project model rather than in isolation.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d3355ca6-eba1-4cb6-afc6-0f8146813d96","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Why this matters
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"In Python, modules are often discovered "on the fly" during the analysis of import statements (e.g., ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"import helper","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"). To maintain an accurate and complete analysis, the tool must immediately know how to process that new file.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"e17528f6-6f2c-4ccd-935b-838511359aaf","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Shared State:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" By passing along the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"def_manager","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"scope_manager","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", and ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"cg","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (Call Graph), it ensures that anything discovered in the submodule is recorded in the same global database used by the main module.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"06bbfe3d-dd1d-4459-b97e-b977a53b1a87","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Context Preservation:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" Passing the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"callStack","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"visited_scope","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" prevents the analyzer from entering circular dependency loops (e.g., Module A imports Module B, which imports Module A).","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"5e188b1a-858a-4da9-8040-7749663efe38","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Configurable Depth:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"decy","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" flag allows the analyzer to control how deep or aggressive the submodule exploration should be, based on the project's settings.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"34e06e7c-0976-4ed6-aaf6-f9dcce0fda27","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"How it works","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b735e9c1-d539-4d1a-acc5-fa2ff5e3f6f7","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Delegation:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" It calls the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"super().analyze_submodule","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" method, providing all the necessary "Manager" objects that act as the analyzer's memory.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"069a121a-f309-4e0c-86d8-5ce10a577af2","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Targeting:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" It specifies the target module ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"imp","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to be processed.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"8be63355-9cd5-4d33-a817-b45f4cfbc2e9","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Consistency:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" It passes the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"ExtProcessor","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" class itself as a reference, ensuring that the submodule is analyzed using the same visitor logic as the parent.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"abb79412-34ca-4f33-aaec-39c86b99337b","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Synchronization:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" It includes the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"modules_analyzed","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" set to ensure that this specific submodule isn't processed multiple times, which optimizes performance and ensures a stable fixed-point analysis.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"40f1b5ea-ea57-465a-aed2-062cfd43e862","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Example Scenario
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"While analyzing ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"main.py","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", the visitor hits the line ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"import utils","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"a433b24b-dae2-4896-9b1f-77b79b9c7268","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"visit_Import","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" method identifies ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"utils","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" as a local project file.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"4ae6e9bb-3e15-429a-b597-aa0446c6b905","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It calls ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"analyze_submodule("utils")","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"fd6356e1-9838-4846-a1ff-f7b177780f67","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The function initiates a fresh ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"ExtProcessor","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" for ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"utils.py","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", linking it to the same project-wide Call Graph and Definition Manager.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"a6590e69-d186-4db1-9b0c-4d87941306b6","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Once ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"utils.py","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is fully processed, the analysis of ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"main.py","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" continues with a complete understanding of what ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"utils","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" contains.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"2dfe2a42-627d-4aa3-80f7-066a87f0fb29","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
